name: MySliderGallery
author: Evgeny S.Zalevskiy

sections.changelog:
2.0.7 – 2019-10-21

  • Added: Image caption when the gallery is open
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.6 – 2019-10-17

  • Fix: cursor icon on dragging
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.5 – 2019-10-17

  • Added: image alt and title attributes to the tag

2.0.4 – 2019-09-17

  • Fix: fix gallery scroll on mobile devices
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.3 – 2019-09-05

  • Fix: Gutenberg shortcode block add and delete
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.2 – 2019-09-02

  • Added: Gutenberg editor – add shortcode block to the new post
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.1 – 2019-08-22

  • Changed: name of plugin was changed from MyGallery to MySliderGallery
  • Added: lazy load to slider
  • Fix: some bugs

2.0.0 – 2019-08-01

  • Added: separate page for editing shortcodes
  • Added: the ability to change the order of images in the visual editor
  • Added: now you can delete and add images
  • Added: customize the slider
  • Added: you can add a title to your slider
  • Added: you can add your HTML classes to the slider
  • Added: added the ability to create a gallery directly when creating a post

=1.1.3 – 2019-07-01 =

  • Fix: some bugs
sections.description:
MySliderGallery WordPress Plugin

MySliderGallery is a wordpress plugin that allows you to create a slider gallery anywhere in your post. You will use the standard wordpress interface to create a slider gallery, so the process should not cause difficulties.

This plugin is built using the latest technical features of wordpress and php. That`s why,this plugin is required:

  • php> = 7
  • wordpress> = 4.8.0

Helpful Links:

Demo – MySliderGallery

Features

  • Clean Design.
  • Supports guttenberg editor and classic editor.
  • Easy customizable
  • Shortcode support.

Installing

  1. You can clone the GitHub repository: https://github.com/zalevsk1y/my-slider-gallery.git
  2. Or download it directly as a ZIP file: https://github.com/zalevsk1y/my-slider-gallery/archive/master.zip

This will download the latest developer copy of MySliderGallery.

How to use this plugin?

Watch this short videos to learn how to use MySliderGallery plugin.

MySliderGallery Tutorial create gallery

MySliderGallery Tutorial edit gallery

MySliderGallery Tutorial Gutenberg editor

MySliderGallery Tutorial Classic editor

Gallery settings

In version 2.0.0, was added the ability to change gallery slider settings.
Plugin settings allow you to control the display of the gallery slider:

  • gallery mode – determines whether there is a preview of the images under the main image of the gallery
  • loop – allows you to create an endless scroll of images in the slider
  • number of thumb items -number of images in the gallery preview below the main image
  • items – determines the number of images in the main window

You can also set the gallery title in the misc settings item

Dependencies

  • baguetteBox.js https://github.com/feimosi/baguetteBox.js/
  • lightslider https://github.com/sachinchoolur/lightslider
  • React Sortable HOChttps://github.com/clauderic/react-sortable-hoc

Bugs

If you find an issue, let us know here!

About Author

Evgeniy Zalevskiy

Follow me on Twitter
